original_title: Black Rituals of Satanic Sex Cults
overview: Descend into the cinematic netherworld the 1970’s most underground sex cults! You will see tearful teens suffer welt-raising ass floggings while the devil’s disciples stuff their virgin assholes, ending in sprays of supercharged cum! Satanic orgies unfold with ritualistic mummification, sexual possession and anus worship. All shown in uncut XXX detail! Includes Cult of Sadists, Witch Sabbath Hexensabbat, and Lucifer’s Lust, plus a gallery showcasing ultra rare 70s publications like Witchcraft Today, which will either have you rushing to church on Sunday or hailing your new God!
title: Black Rituals of Satanic Sex Cults
